content: this is a summary of a legal case in taurage district court regarding a divorce and the division of property between two parties the applicant mn has filed for a divorce from the defendant an due to the defendants alcohol abuse and failure to take care of the familys interests the applicant wants to retain certain assets including a tworoom apartment a barn and plots of land the court has awarded equal ownership of these properties to both parties the court must decide how to divide the property acquired during the marriage considering the value and shares of each spouse in this case the court determined that dividing the property in kind was not appropriate so one spouse was awarded the property while the other received personal ownership the court has also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant for various costs related to the proceedings the court has granted the application in full dissolving the marriage and dividing the matrimonial property between the parties

metadata.cost: 13.28 EUR (court fees) + 991.01 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
